Services.title: Diabetes Management
Services.desc: Dr Aqeel provides care for Type 1, Type 2, and genetically-induced diabetes. He uses advanced technologies such as insulin pumps and continuous glucose monitors to enhance patients’ lives.

Services.title: Growth Disorders
Services.desc: Diagnosis and treatment of growth disorders, including short stature. He will recommend appropriate tests and treatment options, including growth hormone replacement therapy if necessary.

Services.title: Puberty Problems
Services.desc: He handles early, delayed, and puberty-like disorders with sensitivity and years of experience.

Services.title: Tricky Thyroid
Services.desc: Dr Aqeel treats conditions such as congenital and acquired hypothyroidism, hyperthyroidism, and goiter, among others.

Services.title: Vitamin D, Calcium, and Bones
Services.alt: Vitamin D, Calcium, and Bones Image
Services.desc: He has experience in caring for children with vitamin D, calcium, parathyroid gland, and skeletal system disorders like rickets, bowed legs, easy fractures and soft bones

Services.title: Adrenals and Sex Development
Services.desc: Dr Aqeel manages steroid, adrenal, and sex hormone imbalances that affect children’s general health or cause ambiguity in their sex.

Services.title: Complex Genetic-Endocrine Conditions
Services.desc: He has experience in diagnosing and managing complex endocrine disorders related to genetic conditions that affect different organ systems.

Services.title: Obesity
Services.desc: Dr Aqeel provides compassionate and empathetic care for children struggling with weight issues. He will offer practical advice and potential medical treatments with realistic expectations are discussed.

ConductedThrough.title: Consultations
ConductedThrough.desc: Dr Aqeel will review the child’s medical history, perform a physical exam, and order any necessary lab tests or imaging studies.

ConductedThrough.title: Testing
ConductedThrough.desc: These tests may include blood tests, imaging studies (such as X-rays, Ultrasound, MRI, etc.), and hormone stimulation tests.

ConductedThrough.title: Treatment
ConductedThrough.desc: Once a diagnosis has been made, Dr Aqeel will work with the child and their family to develop a treatment plan. Treatment may include medications, hormone replacement therapy, lifestyle changes, or surgery in some cases.

ConductedThrough.title: Holistic Support
ConductedThrough.desc: Dr Aqeel will review the child’s medical history, perform a physical exam, and order any necessary lab tests or imaging studies.
